name: Cundle, or, Over the land and not that other thing that this title may or may not remind you of
name_original: Cundle, or, Over the land and not that other thing that this title may or may not remind you of
description:
Made for LOWREZJAM 2020
Rate my submission!

UPDATE 2020 08 16
- fixed touch controls

Use arrowkeys to move and shoot up and down. You can use the inbuilt touch controls too if you are on mobile.
Press both Left and Right at the same time to reload.
Stay in one spot to repair carriages.
Survive the day!

Made by myself in around 7 days. All assets are my own, and about 90% of them (some sounds excluded) were made within the jam time. This used to be an idea I got from choosing random dictionary words. It was a loudmouthed antisocialist transporting grapefruits to the Republic of the Congo. I didn't add the slurs, though it would have been hilarious.
